page.title: 07Accommodation for tourists
page.content: The Wookey to Bleadney area provides plenty of accommodation for the tourist. In Wookey one can stay at the East Court Guest House or the Fenny Castle Guest House or for farmhouse accommodation there is Rushlands Farm. The Pheasant Inn provides excellent meals for hungry travellers. In Worth the tourist can stay at the Worth House Hotel or Honeycroft Farm. Bed and Breakfast is provided at the Manor House Farm. In Yarley Mrs. S.White of Cross Farm does Bed and Breakfast. The Threeways Hotel in Bleadney has an excellent restaurant and also a caravan park for the self-sufficient tourist. Also in Bleadney the Stradlings Restaurant has a good reputation for excellent cuisine.
